MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan, affecting properties in Penmaen Park and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:33pm.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties due to a damaged underground cable and we expect the power to be restored by 6:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:10pm on 24th March 2021.
